Name: Amos' Bow
Title: Strong-Willed: Amos' Bow
Desc: "I dreamt of ocean waves and sand, of lush forests and land."\n"I dreamt of boars playing in berry bushes, of a towering spire."

Talent.Name: Amos' Bow
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character uses a Skill that costs at least a total of 5 Elemental Dice and Energy</color>, +2 additional DMG. (Once per Round)\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3202}Bow Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
